returns.timestamp: Block timestamp when match was logged

params.limit: Maximum number of IDs to return
Maximum number of IDs to return

params._playerIds: Array of player IDs to fetch

params.eloChange: The ELO points to transfer (calculated off-chain)
params.loserIds: Array of loser player IDs (1 for singles, 2 for doubles)
params.winnerIds: Array of winner player IDs (1 for singles, 2 for doubles)

params.playerId: Unique identifier for the player (UUID as bytes32)

params._playerIds: Array of player IDs to register

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner

getMatchCount().notice: Get the total number of logged matches

getPlayerCount().notice: Get the total number of registered players

getPlayersBatch(bytes32[]).notice: Get multiple players in a single call

logMatch(bytes32,bytes32[],bytes32[],int.notice: Log a match result and update player stats

registerPlayer(bytes32).notice: Register a new player with initial ELO of 1200

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership to a new address
